plz portal 3 or i commit arson
This game is in my top 10 favorites fr. Please play, need Portal 3
The lie was cake or something idk

evet,öncelikle oyun 22.8 saatte bitti, hiç bu kadar beklemiyordum ilk oyuna göre baya iyi süre olarak  oyunu abicim al oyunu çöz bulmacaları yapamadınmı altf4 çek 2 gün sonra yine gir 30dk oyna çık oyun bundan ibaret kuş kadar olan beyninizi yok etmek için tasarlanmış bir oyun sondaki o robotların şarkısı hala kulağımdan gitmiyor sonda duygulanmanız normal.
bug kesinlikle yok (valve yapımı saten)
al oyna 3.70 tl ye steamde harcadığım en iyi 3.70 tl.

Overall great game, and after you finish there is community puzzles, you can make your own puzzles, and there is coop mode. Then there is more fan-made things like Portal Reloaded. Overall i give this game 10 burritos out of 10.
This game is an absolute masterpiece, combining an amazing story with strange levels, I could describe in three words, perfect, puzzle, POTATOES!
Herkes en az bir kere bu oyunu tatmalı!
lgados is annoying untiol she issnt annoying and then she anonY
great game, I like very much
关卡设计挺有意思的就是感觉容易累
Overall fun game! I spent hours playing with my friend in co-op (2-player). We laughed a lot, and had a lot of fun. It is a good puzzle solving game, and good game to play with your friend!
Geniales und witziges Knobelspiel für jedermann. Das Spiel wird einfach nie alt.
best valve game other than csgo
graphics were so good,they made my laptop fans scream

친구가 없어서 솔플만 했는데 재밌게 했음

포탈1에 비해 멀미도 덜하고 퀄리티나 퍼즐이 더 좋았음
제일 좋았던게 옆에서 누가 말걸어줌, 포탈1은 외롭게 글라도스한테서 구박만 받고 살았는데 2편은 두명이서 말 걸어주니깐 안무섭고 대사 듣는 재미도 있었음

스토리는 약간 뻔했는데 몰입도 잘되고 지루하지도 않았음

20년도에 샀다가 포탈1 멀미땜에 2년간 묵혀뒀다 했다
Нахера купил... Легенда, но как-то не зашло
makes brain feel smart, now me happy :)
通关！什么叫第九艺术！这就叫第九艺术！

Talk about a strong, and i mean strong sequel!

This game takes what was so very strong with the first portal, and cranks it to 10! The comedy, the way the game makes you feel either really smart, or really stupid. This is the perfect sequel. So excellently taking what was great before and adding more to it. Great game!

Wheres portal 3?
кооп топ, сюжет топ, 10 порталов из 10
lost braincells but is a sick game
Thow needs a brain cell for playing the Test Chambers.

v社出品，必是极品。portal系列，half life 系列，left 4 dead系列 都是如此。我很期待各大系列的第三章，比如“雪儿（portal 系列 中的主角）”会重返“光圈科技机算机浓缩中心地下实验设施工厂”吗？ 戈登·弗里曼（ half life 系列中的主角 ）会和爱丽克斯先去找“光圈科技中心”的极光号还是去找联合军报杀伊莱之仇呢？希望v社尽快将3大系列的第三部发行，我们都很期待！！！
Just an amazing and genius puzzle game
didnt get racially profiled within the game itself but played on call with friends and they called me slurs so 10/10 expierence
just finished the campaign and boy was I not ready for anything that happened. Also I've completely ran through the co-op twice as well and is always really fun.

Juegazo, a pesar de que este juego se haiga creado hace mucho sigue siendo un muy buen juego, te corre hasta en una PC con bajos recursos, mas o menos a unos 40 a 70 fps. El modo multijugador está muy completo y el modo historia es espectacular.
My favorite puzzle game, everything about this game is well made. If you haven't already go play Portal Reloaded

YES. PLAY THIS. GOOD LORD IT'S GOOD.

The story is full of suspense and a good number of comedic moments, the puzzles are complex but always have a solution in plain sight, and while I did get stuck from time to time, I didn't need to look anything up to finish the game. It is significantly better if you play the first game before it, as that establishes a lot of skills that make this one a lot easier, but on its own it still does everything it needs to.

JUST PLAY IT ALREADY YOU MORON.

Despite that fact that the most amount of recommended reviews belong to this game is true, literally really fun and a ton of twists, lives up to the name best game on Steam, and you can even play user-made levels and create your own too, if you say otherwise i'll be stealing your kneecaps
ITS FUN AND MAKES YOU REALY THINK OF ALL POSIBLE ASCAPE RUTES
Loved playing this new to me classic.
One of my favorite games of all time. Its not just smart, its actually really funny as well
This game expands on the first game mechanically and story wise, not to mention the characters are great, seriously play the game it's good

So Leute, dieses Spiel Niemals mit einem Freund 9 Stunden Am Stück spielen, ihr werdet Depressionen bekommen und die nächsten 5 Wochen davon Träumen, Bitte Ich musste Zum Arzt Deswegen. Mein Gehirn ist matsche patsche. 



(Ich muss Es Weiter Empfehlen ich werde sonst von den Robotern Geholt)
fun game they should make a prequel to this

If you never played Portal 2, you are missing a truly masterpiece, both the puzzle aspect of the game, and the narrative, are more than well done. And the best part, you can play with a friend. Now, who is ready to make some science?
One of the best games ever created. A Must play.
best game, its was better then shitty mobile game ads.
This is my personal favorite game, 10/10 worth the money.
How do you not have this game yet?
it's a really fun game and it's also a  multiplayer game it is also fun in more then 1 way you have to complete fun obstacles.

A great step up from the first Portal game, much longer with a much better story and characters.
